articles.title: 'Hanuman Chalisa' becomes first Indian YouTube video to cross 3 billion views: T-Series - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The 'Hanuman Chalisa' video by T-Series has over 12 million 'likes' since it was uploaded on YouTube 11 years ago.
articles.content:
A rendition of Hanuman Chalisa featuring Gulshan Kumar and sung by Hariharan has become the first Indian video on YouTube to cross three billion views, music label T-Series said.
